ocr_markdown:
```markdown
#### Section 1, Module 1: Reading and Writing

____ traditional descriptions of pollination syndromes (suites of floral traits, such as nectar composition and symmetry, hypothesized to have independently evolved as a result of selection pressure exerted by pollinators) and recent empirical observations of floral-trait combinations have led some ecologists to express reservations about the utility of those descriptions.

**3.** Which choice completes the text with the most logical and precise word or phrase?

A) Discrepancies between  
B) Proclamations of  
C) Recurrences of  
D) Affinities between  
```

questions.passage_text: Traditional descriptions of pollination syndromes (suites of floral traits, such as nectar composition and symmetry, hypothesized to have independently evolved as a result of selection pressure exerted by pollinators) and recent empirical observations of floral-trait combinations have led some ecologists to express reservations about the utility of those descriptions.
questions.question_text: Which choice completes the text with the most logical and precise word or phrase?
questions.explanation: The text discusses ecologists' reservations due to inconsistencies between traditional descriptions and recent observations.
